data.name: strDefQuitMsg
data.value: Best Chat has exited.

data.name: strGlobalAliasesDesc
data.value: Lists custom command sets you can run as one.

data.name: strGlobalAliasesTitle
data.value: Aliases

data.name: strGlobalAltNicksDesc
data.value: Enter any alternate nicks that Best Chat should use if your normal nick isn't available. You don't need to include your default nick.

data.name: strGlobalAltNicksTitle
data.value: Alterate Nicks

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformDesc
data.value: Groups tasks that Best Chat runs at select events. These are all commands you were otherwise enter from the input box and can include those from plugins and aliases.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformTitle
data.value: Auto-perform

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenJoiningChanDesc
data.value: Enter commands to run when joining a channel on any network. This might be overridden by the settings for each network and further by individual channels.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenJoiningChanTitle
data.value: When joining a channel on any network

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenJoiningNetDesc
data.value: Enter any commands to run when you join any network. Thise can include commands from plugins and aliases.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenJoiningNetTitle
data.value: When joining a network

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenOpeningUserChatDesc
data.value: Enter commands to run when opening a user chat on any network. This might be overridden by the settings for each network.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenOpeningUserChatTitle
data.value: When opening a user chat on any network

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenStartingBestChatDesc
data.value: Enter any commands to run when Best Chat starts. This can include plugins and aliases.

data.name: strGlobalAutoPerformWhenStartingBestChatTitle
data.value: When Starting Best Chat

data.name: strGlobalConnAutoReconnectDesc
data.value: When your connection is lost unexpectedly, Best Chat can automatically reconnect to the server for you.

data.name: strGlobalConnAutoReconnectTitle
data.value: Reconnect when disconnected unexpectedly

data.name: strGlobalConnCharEncodingDesc
data.value: For multiple clients to correctly read messages with non-ASCII characters on IRC, they need to use the same character encoding.

data.name: strGlobalConnCharEncodingTitle
data.value: C_haracter Encoding

data.name: strGlobalConnDefQuitMsgDesc
data.value: Specifies a default quit message to use when on is not explicitly specified for a network or via the /quit command.

data.name: strGlobalConnDefQuitMsgTitle
data.value: Default Quit _Message

data.name: strGlobalConnDesc
data.value: These preferences affect how Best Chat connects to the Internet.

data.name: strGlobalConnEnableIdentDesc
data.value: Allows Best Chat to connect to servers that require an ident response

data.name: strGlobalConnEnableIdentTitle
data.value: Enable _Identification Server during connection process

data.name: strGlobalConnMaxAttemptsDesc
data.value: This is number of times Best Chat attempts to connect to a server or network. A value of 1 means Best Chat will never attempt to reconnect to the server.

data.name: strGlobalConnMaxAttemptsTitle
data.value: Maximum Connection _Attempts:

data.name: strGlobalConnRejoinAfterKickDesc
data.value: If this is turned on, Best Chat will try (only once) to rejoin a channel you got kicked from. Note: Some channels dislike auto-rejoin and will ban you. So be careful.

data.name: strGlobalConnRejoinAfterKickTitle
data.value: R_ejoin when kicked

data.name: strGlobalConnTitle
data.value: _Connection

data.name: strGlobalConnUnlimitedAttemptsDesc
data.value: If checked, Best Chat will attempt to reconnect to any server forever. If unchecked, the limit will be to the right.

data.name: strGlobalConnUnlimitedAttemptsTitle
data.value: Unlimited Attempts?

data.name: strGlobalDccDesc
data.value: DCC lets you bypass a server once you connected in order to talk to a specific user, send them files, or receive files from them. Use this tab to control those settings.

data.name: strGlobalDccDownloadsFolderDesc
data.value: Specifies where to save all files received via DCC

data.name: strGlobalDccDownloadsFolderTitle
data.value: Downloads Folder

data.name: strGlobalDccEnabledDesc
data.value: You must check this to allow Best Chat to use DCC. Otherwise, all DCC chats will be blocked and DCC won't appear in the menus.

data.name: strGlobalDccEnabledTitle
data.value: Enabled

data.name: strGlobalDccGetIpFromServerDesc
data.value: If checked, Best Chat will ask the server for the IP address to use.

data.name: strGlobalDccGetIpFromServerTitle
data.value: Get the local IP from the server

data.name: strGlobalDccTitle
data.value: DCC (Direct Client Chat)

data.name: strGlobalStalkWordsDesc
data.value: Enter any strings you want to trigger a notify besides your nick. This could be anything you're interested in, "@op", "@room", etc. Your nick is implied. If you turned on Agressive Notify in the application's main preferences, Best Chat will try to get your attention

data.name: strGlobalStalkWordsTitle
data.value: Stalk Words

data.name: strIrcRootDesc
data.value: All IRC specific settings are here.

data.name: strIRCRootTitle
data.value: IRC

data.name: strNetDesc
data.value: Lists preferences specific to the network {0}
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.

data.name: strNetTitle
data.value: {0} network preferences
data.comment: "{0}" will be replaced with the name of the network.
